page.title: 03LASSWADE COMMUNITY SCHOOL
page.content: Lasswade High School Centre, situated in Bonnyrigg, is a{community school,}a comprehensive school which also offers adult daytime and evening classes in academic subjects as well as a wide range of indoor{hobbies}such as {winemaking, computing, electronics, {chess}etc. A very successful club for adult{handicapped}also offers a range of activities e.g. educational help, bingo, discos and using computers. Lasswade High School Centre also runs classes and activities outside Bonnyrigg e.g. in old people's homes, at Loanhead Primary School, e.g. dressmaking and flower arranging. The Kevock{choir}, nationally known with several tv appearances, practice in LHSC as well the local{orchestras}- both senior and junior.
